targets.query:
SELECT  SUM(total) as za_requests, SUM(times) / SUM(total) AS zb_response_time FROM (
  SELECT SUM("count") AS total, SUM("sum") AS times FROM "http_in_responsetime" 
  WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service$/ AND http_path =~ /^$path$/  GROUP BY http_path
) GROUP BY http_path

SELECT  SUM(errors) / SUM(total) AS zc_error_rate FROM (
  SELECT SUM("count") AS total, SUM("errorcount") AS errors FROM "http_in_error" 
  WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service$/ AND http_path =~ /^$path$/  GROUP BY http_path fill(0)
)
GROUP BY http_path

SELECT  SUM(sum) / SUM(count)
FROM "http_in_responsetime" 
WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service$/  AND http_path=~ /^$path$/
GROUP BY time($__interval), http_path fill(none)

panels.description: Incoming HTTP Requests per second for the selected endpoints and applications

targets.query:
SELECT  SUM(count)/$__interval_ms*1000 AS value
FROM "http_in_responsetime" 
WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service$/  AND http_path=~ /^$path$/ 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: In Req / Sec

panels.description: The error rate of incoming http requests for the selected endpoints and applications

targets.query:
SELECT  SUM(errors) / SUM(total) AS value FROM (
  SELECT SUM("count") AS total, SUM("errorcount") AS errors FROM "http_in_error" 
  WHERE $timeFilter AND service =~ /^$service$/ AND http_path =~ /^$path$/  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
)
WHERE total > 0
GROUP BY time($__interval)
